api_list.name: Random cards
api_list.description: Random cards, defualt is all 52 cards.  Can include jokers (jokers=enable).  Can be selection of cards, ie count=10 or count=65

api_list.name: Back of cards
api_list.description: Back of cards.  Colour = can be blue or red

api_list.name: Deck of cards
api_list.description: Deck of cards.  Jokers can be enabled (jokers=enable). You can have many decks ie decks=3
